## Biography

Akshay Prasadan is a third year PhD student at CMU, working with Matey Neykov on
research topics in the areas of minimax theory, constrained estimation, and
Gaussian sequence models. He received a BS in Mathematics and Economics at The
Ohio State University. He is a Pittsburgh local and is passionate about the
stock market.

## Education

- **The Ohio State University** | Columbus, OH, USA</br>
  BS in Mathematics and Economics | 2016-2020
  
- **Carnegie Mellon University** | Pittsburgh, PA, USA</br>
  MS in Statistics | 2020-2022
